item.title: Hana add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Hana add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "People can lose their lives in libraries. They ought to be warned." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Hana add a quote by Cicero
item.description: "If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need." -- Cicero

item.title: Hana add a quote by Joan Bauer
item.description: "My grandma always said that God made libraries so that people didn't have any excuse to be stupid." -- Joan Bauer

item.title: Hana add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description:
"Sebab setelah hujan selalu ada seseorang yang datang sebagai pelangi, dan memelukmu.
: Aku ingin orang itu selamanya aku. " -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Buku adalah sahabat paling setia rela mendampingi sepanjang waktu di mana pun aku berada tanpa pernah memikirkan dirinya." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Menjadi presiden itu berarti melayani dengan segenap hati rakyat yang meminta suka dan menyerahkan jutaan keranjang dukanya padamu... " -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Pada setiap napasnya bunda membuat matahari baru dalam jiwamu" -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Buku yang kubaca selalu memberi sayap-sayap baru. Membawaku terbang ke taman-taman pengetahuan paling menawan, melintasi waktu dan peristiwa, berbagi cerita cinta, menyapa semua tokoh yang ingin kujumpai, sambil bermain di lengkung pelangi." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Aku selalu bermimpi matahari melahirkan para guru dan guru melahirkan para matahari..." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Penyair tak mempunyai tugas lain kecuali membaca kalbu semesta dan menangkapnya dengan hati, getar pena, bahkan topimu." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Bunda, engkau adalah puisi abadi yang tak pernah kutemukan dalam buku..." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Hana add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "You are what you write." -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Hana add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Hana add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Hana add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Hana add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Hana add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane
